Producer: Marc Butan, Christian Carion, Brahim Chioua, No√©mie Devide
Screenwriter: Christian Carion, Laure Irrmann, Christian Carion, Laure Irrmann
Synopsis: Driving in the heart of the Highlands, Edmond Murray receives a call from his ex-wife, in tears. Their 7-year-old son has gone missing from a campsite. Soon, it becomes clear that the child has been kidnapped, and the parents give way to despair.
Title: My Son
